column8: Robert, Bill and John like Mary a lot.
column10: Mary says: "I like tall men. Who is the tallest?"
column12: John says: "I am the tallest. You should marry me."
column14: Mary says: "Really? I think Bill is as tall as you."
column21: Mary says: "Bill is shorter than I thought!"
column22: S1P10|Bill is shorter than I thought!
column26: Mary says: "No, I have not measured Robert's height yet. How tall is Robert?"
column36: Mary says: "No. If you want to marry me, you have to bring me at least 10 bananas."
column40: S1P18|Bill collects more bananas than Robert.
column42: And John collects the most bananas!
column44: John says: "You wanted 10 bananas. I collected 15 bananas. I collected more bananas than I had to!"
column45: S1P20|I collected more bananas than I had to!
column49: Mary says: "Not yet. My husband must run fast too. Who runs the fastest?"
column51: S1P23|Robert, Bill and John run as fast as they can.
column59: S1P27|John runs as fast as birds fly.
column61: S1P28|Mary is amazed by how fast John can run.
column63: Suddenly John falls and breaks his leg.
column67: She asks him: "What happened? Are you okay?"
column69: John says: "My leg hurts, but I am fine. Do I win? I ran the fastest."
column71: Mary says: "No. You cannot run. I cannot marry you."
column73: Mary must choose Robert or Bill.
column75: Mary says: "I want a boat. Who can build the biggest boat?"
column77: Bill builds a very big boat.
column79: S1P36|The boat is wider than Mary is tall.
column81: S1P37|Robert builds a smaller boat than Bill.
column85: Mary says: "Yes, congratulations! Here are my berries. I have 9 berries. You are allowed to eat 5 berries. But save the rest for me."
column88: Mary says: "You can eat exactly 3 more berries."
column89: S1P40|You can eat exactly 3 more berries.
column95: She says: "How many berries did you eat?"
column96: S1P42|How many berries did you eat?
column101: Mary says: "I said that you can eat 5 berries, but no more! You ate more berries than you were allowed to!"
column102: S1P44|You ate more berries than you were allowed to!
